section.name: Screencast
section.p: Here is a 10 minute screencast that shows the different interfaces in action, and the scope of the application.

ul.li: Viewing the preloaded cargos in the admin application
Registering of a few expected events for the new cargo, then tracking to confirm it's on track
Registering of an unexpected event for the new cargo, then tracking to see that it becomes misdirected
Registering event using the scheduled file import interface

section.p: It's a little difficult to read the text, but you can use it as a guide for playing around on your own with the actual application.

p.em: The recording was made using IShowU HD.
